name: No I In Team
description:
Welcome to No I In Team, a puzzle platforming game all about team work! Control 3 different characters in a handful of levels to help a team of 3 navigate their way through a dungeon. Full of puzzles, traps, and platforming, the dungeon is no forgiving place for this team, and it's imperative that they work together if they wish to exit successfully.

The music used in this game is Jerry Five by Kevin MacLeod. 

Here is a link to Kevin MacLeod's YouTube channel if you want to view his material:(398) Kevin MacLeod - YouTube

This game was really fun to work on. The level design could've been better but I think it turned out ok in the later half of the game. While I procrastinated a little bit during the 7 days, I am still proud of what I ended up creating. As a 17 year old aspiring game developer, I can say I have a lot to learn, but this project is the first stepping stone in the journey that awaits me. Although it may not be of better quality that what other participants made, I think I did alright for this being my first game I ever made!

As a side note, I apologize if anything looks distorted or weird, I ran into aspect ratio issues and had to resize my tile maps sadly.

I might work on the game further or I will move on to a new project, either way I ha da lot of fun making the game.
